mapper.insert: insert into place_tb (place_no, place_name, road_name_adr, area, sigungu, zip_code, longitude, latitude, place_category, create_time, modified_time, score) values (place_sq.nextval, #{place_name}, #{road_name_adr}, #{area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sigungu}, #{zip_code}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{place_category}, #{create_time}, #{modified_time}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT place_no, place_category, place_name, road_name_adr FROM place_tb WHERE place_category = #{category} AND road_name_adr LIKE '%' || #{location} || '%'
